sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { path } from 'src/constants/path' import { formatMoney, formatSold, generateNameId } from 'src/utils/helper' import ProductRating from '../ProductRating/ProductRating' import * as S from './productItem.style' export default function ProductItem({ product }) { return ( {product.name} đ{formatMoney(product.price)} đ{formatMoney(product.price_before_discount)} {formatSold(product.sold)} Đã bán ) }
